entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
